Class MagicalItem

public class MagicalItem

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Description copied from class: Item

    • getAllowableActions

      public java.util.List<Action> getAllowableActions()
      Getter.

      Returns an unmodifiable copy of the actions list so that calling methods won't be able to change what this Item can do without the Item checking.

      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Item
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions
